description: An independent review of Tynwald members' pay says MLCs should be paid less than MHKs.
title: Isle of Man: Overhaul of Tynwald members' pay proposed
title_page: Isle of Man: Overhaul of Tynwald members' pay proposed - BBC News
maintext: Roger Tomlinson, from PAG, said the proposals did not go far enough to recognise the "differential in the workload" between the two branches.
